General.Name: China Resources Double-Crane Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: China Resources Double-Crane Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a pharmaceutical company in the People's Republic of China. The company offers pharmaceutical products for hypertension, diabetes, hypercholesterolemia, gastrointestinal care, and pediatric care, as well as peritoneal dialysis solution. It also provides injections for acute craniocerebral trauma, viral pneumonia and bronchitis, infectious diseases, calcium deficiency, metabolic acidosis, vitamin B and C deficiency, chronic severe pain, drug-resistant bacteria, and hypovolemia. In addition, the company offers pharmaceutical raw materials; pharmaceutical equipment comprising aluminum-plastic blister packaging machine and multifunctional cartoning machine. The company was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. China Resources Double-Crane Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Resources Pharmaceutical Group Limited.
General.Address: No. 1, Lize East 2nd Road, Beijing, China, 100102
